name: Europecoin Foundation
goal: Europecoin is a worldwide currency, that is borderless. However its run by a group, that is rooted in the pro European activism movement for a decentralized and collaborating humanity. Our cryptocurrency is run and shaped by this spirit and aims to make it easier and safer for the world, to deal with Europe and for Europe to deal with the world.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Regulations around Bitcoin and other Cryptocurrencies

Regulations around related services and market models

Strategies to foster an innovating environment

Technical strategies to use blockchain technologies for governance

International agreement around cryptocurrency ecomomy

last watched and engaged EU tender:
The Blockchain Observatory
